page.title: 07Employment in Bromp on Swale
page.content:
Many of the people travel out of the village to their places of work,e.g. Richmond,Darlington,Teesside and even further afield.
The village offers work in shops,pubs,farms and the school.New house building has provided some jobs.
On the small industrial estate there are storage depots,retail,commercial and manufacturing units.Some companies rely on raw materials quarried locally
The only major employer of women is Ramar Dresses although some women work at U.B.Foods. Others find work as domestic cleaners or baby minders.
Other companies include Jolly(timber merchants),Pipeline Engineering, and Yorkshire Water Authority.
